creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: four lines of cursive inscription; light blue paper with gold decoration with bridge, foliage, and clouds
inscription: (Monk Saigyo // Even a person free of passion / would be moved / to sadness: / autumn evening / in a marsh where snipes fly up)
title: Poem from the Shinkokinshu and Saigyo's Sankashu
